short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The extension that manages bookmarks and finds the best time to remind you to revisit.

Bookmarks are meant to be consumed, not clog up your browser as an open tab.

Save tabs and ACTUALLY remember to visit them.
